C E F G L M P W 

C

clear_from_duplicates(LinkedListMultimap<String, byte[]>) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This function edit a LinkedListMultimap removing all duplicate keys
This should be used only with an original file
If the file has been edited from someone (translated in part for example) this could lead to losing some important entries (Because the cycle when find a key, start removing all his duplicates)

E

extractComments() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader
This function extract all the comments from the loaded file, returning them
Remember that the reader has "isnewFile", this means the comments are loaded only in the second file
(You can simply change that in the Window class if you want, setting it at true)
extractKeys() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader
This function extract all the keys from the loaded file, returning them
extractValues() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader
This function extract all the entries from the loaded file, returning them REMEMBER that if "isfinalfile" is true this include comments

F

file_has_duplicates() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This function return a boolean that indicate if the file has duplicates or not

G

generate_xml_output(PlanetCoasterReader) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This function generate the xml Document from the reader
It's used to prepare the xml output after the merge
getDuplicatesKeys() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This function return an ArrayList that contains all the duplicate keys found
getFinalFile() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterMerge
This function return the final file, created editing the second file during the merge
getNumberDuplicates_found() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This function return an integer value that indicate the number of duplicates found
getRemovedKeys() - Method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterMerge
This function return a LinkedListMultimap with all the strings lost during the merge
(Keys in the old file but not present in the new one)

L

loaded_file_multimap - Variable in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader
LinkedListMultimap that contains the loaded file

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.Window
Main execution of the program

P

PlanetCoasterDuplicates - Class in PlanetCoasterXML
This class call the Reader to open the file and then check for duplicates keys.
PlanetCoasterDuplicates(PlanetCoasterReader) - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This constructor take a PlanetCoasterReader in input, and check if there is any duplicate key
PlanetCoasterDuplicates(String) - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterDuplicates
This constructor use the other constructor, after creating the Readers from the file path
Currently this is not used, it's here for convenience because it could be useful
PlanetCoasterMerge - Class in PlanetCoasterXML
This class merge two PlanetCoasterReader using their keys
It's basically the class that take the translations from the old file and put them in the new file.
PlanetCoasterMerge(PlanetCoasterReader, PlanetCoasterReader) - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterMerge
The constructor ask for two PlanetCoasterReader to merge using their keys
The result of the merge can be accessed with getFinalFile()
PlanetCoasterMerge(String, String) - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterMerge
This constructor use the other constructor, after creating the Readers from the file paths
Currently this is not used, it's here for convenience because it could be useful
PlanetCoasterReader - Class in PlanetCoasterXML
This class read a single planet coaster xml file storing the data in a LinkedListMultimap; I cannot use a normal HashMap because i need duplicate keys, and to keep the insertion order
The Keys are Strings because the translations Keys are simple strings
The translated phrase is stored into a byte[] because i can store it in UTF-8 (or another encoding if i want to change).
PlanetCoasterReader(String, boolean) - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader
The constructor method open the file and call a method to fill the LinkedListMultimap
PlanetCoasterReaderException - Exception in PlanetCoasterXML
This is a little Exception Class that be thrown when an error occur in the Reader
PlanetCoasterReaderException(String) - Constructor for exception PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReaderException
 
PlanetCoasterWriter - Class in PlanetCoasterXML
This class is made of static methods because it does not need to have any field
Every method is useful to to write a list to a file or to prepare an output (for example preparing the xml code).
PlanetCoasterWriter() - Constructor for class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
 
PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception in PlanetCoasterXML
This is a little Exception Class that be thrown when an error occurred while writing in one of the methods in this class
PlanetCoasterWriterException(String) - Constructor for exception PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriterException
 
PlanetCoasterXML - package PlanetCoasterXML
 
print_log(String) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.Window
Static method to pretty print the log with time

W

Window - Class in PlanetCoasterXML
This class create the main window with the buttons to choose the 2 files and to create the new file; This class has a listener for each button, plus some threads for the processing.
write_byte_array_to_file(ArrayList<byte[]>, String) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
This is used mainly to write a file with the values of a Reader, for example the comments
write_multimap_to_file(LinkedListMultimap<String, byte[]>, String) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, it use the other write_multimap_to_file with 3 parameters
write_multimap_to_file(LinkedListMultimap<String, byte[]>, String, HashSet<String>, boolean) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, using format "Key - Value" for each line
There is also a keys_to_avoid array, if the user want to not write some keys (used to not write comments for example)
write_string_array_to_file(ArrayList<String>, String) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
This is used mainly to write a file with the duplicate keys found using PlanetCoasterDuplicates
write_xml_file(Document, String) - Static method in class PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter
This method write the XML document to an XML file
